name: add custom google tag manager
author: Oren hahiashvili

sections.description:
Plugin Description

Add your wp website Google Tag Manager code by one click.
just activate the plugin, put your tag manager personal ID(TagID) and your tag will be set & ready.
the easiest & lightest & fastest & shorted & accurated plugin that ever made for tag manager.
dont forgot to share ğŸ™‚ Manage your tag manager just by click!
Hope you enjoy and find this plugin very helpful, dont forget to share with other’s for better web ğŸ™‚
